name: 陳曉瑩
objective:
本課程進一步加深商業會議所需之英語能力，諸如會議重點摘要、發表簡報及主持司儀；另詳細介紹其常見隨行外賓的英語使用情境、商展介紹、外賓接待、工廠參觀及活動導覽等。
This course prepares students for conferences with focused English skills such as summarizing speeches, delivering presentations, acting as a MC or moderator. Introduction to other workplace scenarios involving escorting international guests, such as working at trade shows, acting as an attach, providing factory tours or other guided tours.
